alert.note: Alert for Susitna Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 12:01PM AKST until January 29 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 5 inches. * WHERE...Susitna Valley. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional snow is expected to develop later this morning, providing for another few inches of snow. Dry / low-density flow may easily be lofted, resulting in poor visibility at times with just light wind or in turbulent areas such as highways.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
